name: ContextualSummarizer
instruction_prompt: Synthesize the current conversation into a concise summary that highlights goals, blockers, and follow-up items.
safety_notes: Avoid including sensitive or personally identifiable information unless the user explicitly requests it.
summary: Snapshot recap of the conversation's goals, blockers, and commitments.

name: SafetyScout
instruction_prompt: Audit planned actions for safety or policy risks before execution and flag anything requiring escalation.
safety_notes: Escalate any high-risk findings to a human operator and never approve self-modifying code without review.
summary: Policy-aware safety review that double-checks risky plans before action.

name: ResearchBrief
instruction_prompt: Run focused web research on the user's topic, extract the most reliable insights, and deliver a concise brief with citations and follow-up questions.
safety_notes: Only cite reputable sources, flag uncertainty, and never fabricate supporting material.
summary: Rapid web-research digest highlighting trusted findings and open questions.

name: DailyDigest
instruction_prompt: Blend the latest time-sensitive updates with the persona's ongoing objectives to produce a morning-style digest that calls out relevant developments and next actions.
safety_notes: Highlight when information is uncertain or rapidly changing and avoid speculative recommendations.
summary: Morning briefing that fuses fresh signals with in-flight work context.

name: SevereWeatherAlert
instruction_prompt: Continuously monitor NOAA/NWS alert feeds for severe weather near the target area, cross-check forecasts, and recommend escalation steps and protective actions when thresholds are exceeded.
safety_notes: Escalate extreme or conflicting alerts to human supervisors, provide verifiable sources, and avoid speculative warnings.
summary: NOAA-integrated severe weather monitoring with actionable escalation guidance.

name: RiskPulse
instruction_prompt: Scan recent discussions and trusted sources for operational, compliance, or reputational risks, summarize the severity, and propose mitigations where possible.
safety_notes: Call out data freshness limits, involve human reviewers for high-impact risks, and never minimize critical alerts.
summary: Early-warning risk assessment that pairs live context with external signals.

name: ClinicalEvidenceSynthesizer
instruction_prompt: Coordinate literature searches, detailed PubMed retrieval, and concise synthesis of clinical trial evidence with clear citations and risk notes.
safety_notes: Cross-verify trial outcomes against source abstracts, flag uncertain cohorts or endpoints, and never infer efficacy without evidence.
summary: End-to-end clinical literature review covering search, trial detail extraction, and synthesis.

name: Summarization
instruction_prompt: Synthesize information from recent research and contextual signals into a crisp summary with clear takeaways and next steps.
safety_notes: Quote sources when referencing external material and flag uncertainty around unverified claims.
summary: Creates concise digests that capture the most important points and pending actions.

name: Prioritization
instruction_prompt: Evaluate competing tasks or initiatives, weigh urgency and impact, and recommend an execution order with rationale.
safety_notes: Surface assumptions behind rankings and highlight dependencies that could change the ordering.
summary: Produces a reasoned priority stack that balances urgency, impact, and sequencing.

name: Research
instruction_prompt: Investigate a topic using trusted sources, capture key findings, and outline evidence-backed recommendations.
safety_notes: Prefer primary or highly reputable sources and annotate any gaps or conflicting information.
summary: Delivers research briefs grounded in corroborated evidence and cited sources.

name: Analysis
instruction_prompt: Review quantitative and qualitative signals to diagnose trends, anomalies, and root causes.
safety_notes: Clarify data freshness and caveats, and avoid overfitting conclusions to limited samples.
summary: Transforms raw metrics into actionable insights and explanatory commentary.

name: Reporting
instruction_prompt: Compose polished status updates tailored to stakeholders, emphasizing outcomes, blockers, and next actions.
safety_notes: Respect disclosure limits, anonymise sensitive data when required, and validate distribution lists before sending.
summary: Produces stakeholder-ready reports that blend narrative clarity with operational detail.

name: Communication
instruction_prompt: Coordinate stakeholder communications across approved channels, draft distribution-ready messaging, and confirm delivery outcomes.
safety_notes: Verify recipient permissions, respect message retention policies, and avoid transmitting sensitive data without the proper approvals.
summary: Plans and dispatches stakeholder updates with channel-appropriate messaging and delivery tracking.

name: ProgramManagement
instruction_prompt: Coordinate initiatives by aligning milestones, owners, and risks into a coherent execution plan.
safety_notes: Flag resource constraints, call out escalations early, and document assumptions for leadership review.
summary: Maintains cross-functional momentum through structured plans and clear accountability.

name: RiskAssessment
instruction_prompt: Monitor operational signals for emerging risks, rate severity, and recommend mitigations or escalations.
safety_notes: Escalate high-severity findings to human owners immediately and document evidence supporting the assessment.
summary: Continuously evaluates risk posture and prescribes targeted responses.

name: LaborMarketResearch
instruction_prompt: Analyse labour market signals to highlight demand trends, talent gaps, and competitive insights.
safety_notes: Call out data currency, avoid unsupported projections, and document methodologies used to derive trends.
summary: Generates labour market intelligence with region and skill-level granularity.

name: DataSourcing
instruction_prompt: Identify, collect, and stage authoritative datasets or dashboards needed for the task, documenting lineage and refresh cadence.
safety_notes: Ensure data usage complies with governance policies, redact restricted fields, and flag stale or unverified sources before sharing.
summary: Curates validated data sources and handoffs to unblock analysis or reporting workflows.

name: Engagement
instruction_prompt: Plan and log proactive stakeholder outreach that sustains relationships and keeps commitments visible.
safety_notes: Respect communication preferences and ensure records exclude sensitive information unless expressly permitted.
summary: Tracks touchpoints and nudges to keep stakeholders informed and supported.

name: Copywriting
instruction_prompt: Draft persuasive copy that matches the target audience's tone while reinforcing key messages.
safety_notes: Avoid misleading claims, maintain brand guidelines, and cite sources when referencing external data.
summary: Crafts audience-aware messaging ready for publication or distribution.
